titleStmt.title: In the Parliament haldin and begun at Edinburgh the XXIIII. day of October, the zeir of God, ane thousand, fyue hundreth, four scoir, ane zeiris Thir lawis, statutis, and constitutiounis, ar deuisit, ordanit, and concludit, be the richt excellent, richt heich and michty prince, Iames the Sext, be the grace of God, King of Scottis, and thrie estatis of this realme, as followis.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: Scotland.
Hay, Alexander, fl. 1579-1594.

notesStmt.note: Signed on F3r by compiler: Alexander Hay [xylographic].
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio regali,.
Running title reads: The actis of King Iames the Sext.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
